Description:
Detects the creation of a schtasks that potentially executes a payload stored in the Windows Registry using PowerShell.

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Scheduled Task Executing Payload from Registry
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\schtasks.exe' and original_file_name = 'schtasks.exe') and command like '%/create%' and (command like '%get-itemproperty%' or command like '% gp %') and (command like '%hkcu:%' or command like '%hklm:%' or command like '%registry::%' or command like '%hkey_%')) and  not (command like '%frombase64string%' or command like '%encodedcommand%'))
